tool_description: Are you tired of searching for images through countless websites? 😓 We have the solution! 🌟
name: Infinite Image Search
title: Infinite Image Search

api_list.name: Health check
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://infinite-image-search.p.rapidapi.com/health-check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "infinite-image-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://infinite-image-search.p.rapidapi.com/health-check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "infinite-image-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
